title: Episode 1: The Beginning
text: Get rid of the Monday blues with our easy listening chat show, covering every basis of day to day life, Hosted by Grant Fosbraey and Jacob Jenner. Put the kettle on, or grab a cold beer and get comfy!

title: Episode 2: Music, conspiracy theories and the impact of social media
text: Come and join us for our second episode! Where we will discuss our musical background, we look into some conspiracy theories then finally exploring the impact of social media across human connection.

title: Episode 3: Hot weather, horror movie culture and technology
text: A week of basking in the sun, fulfilling our appetite for horror movies; did someone offer Grant a whiskey? let's discuss it!
